|brand = Stationpc |model = Station |submodelappend = yes |submodel = M1 |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = N150 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = Mini PC |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Rockchip;RK3328; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A53 |cpu1spd = 1.5 GHz <!-- 1.5 GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = 64-bit
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Samsung;KLMAG1JETD-B041; |flash1size = 16 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 2 GiB |ram1chip = Micron;MT41K256M16TW-107; |ram1_num = 4 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Realtek;RTL8211F; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;;; |stockos = Linux;;;
|exp_if_types = USB 3.0, USB 2.0 |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 8 |pwr_amp_dc = 3 |pwr_conn = USB Female Type-C
|serial = yes,, via GPIO header,, 3.3V TTL,, (1500000,8,N,1) |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Bluetooth 4.2, HDMI 2.0, CVBS, IR receiver, Micro SD Card slot, RTC w/ battery, metal case |addchip = 2-VRMS Audio Line Driver;TI;DRV632;;1;,,, Power Management IC w/RTC;Rockchip;RK805-1;;1;,,, 20V 2.4A P-Channel MOSFET;Will Semiconductor;SPM2015;;1;,,, 20V .89A N-Channel MOSFET;Will Semiconductor;WNM2021;;2;,,, 5.5V 2A Low Loss Power Distribution Switch;Silergy Corp;SY6280;;2;,,, 1-Line Bi-directional Transient Voltage Suppressor;TWGMC;AZ5825;;1;,,, 1-Line Bi-directional Transient Voltage Suppressor;Will Semiconductor;ESD5451N;;9;,,, 1-Line Uni-directional Transient Voltage Suppressor;Will Semiconductor;ESD9X5VU;;4;,,, 4-Line Uni-directional Transient Voltage Suppressor;Will Semiconductor;ESD5304D;;4; |802dot11_protocols = bgn
|defaulip = acquired via DHCP |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = T-Chip |manuf_model = ROC-RK3328-PC |manuf_rev = V 1.1 |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = Armbian, Ubuntu 18.04
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 10/2020 |estprice = 75 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B08XBBWBBJ |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = Fn-Link 6223A-SRD |rad1modif = SDIO/UART |rad1chip1 = Realtek;RTL8723DS; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Rockchip]]'' RK3328 :Quad-Core ARM Cortex-A53 (@1.5GHz) *GPU: ''Mali-450 MP2'' (OpenGL ES2.0, OpenVG1.1) :VPU (with 4K VP9 and 4K 10-bit H265/H264 decoding) *Memory: 2GB (SDRAM) DDR3L *Storage: 16GB eMMC, TF card (max.128GB)/MMC card *Network: 1x Gigabit Ethernet *USB: 1x USB 3.0 port, 1x USB 3.0 OTG port, 1x USB 2.0 ports *GPIO: 1x 26-pin headers *Power Source: USB Type-C
==Links of Interest== *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2020/10/30/station-p1-m1-fanless-mini-pcs-run-media-or-desktop-optimized-android-os/ ''Station P1 & M1 fanless mini PCs'' on '''CNX|Software''' ]
